choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like #{_parameter} or contents like #{_parameter}

choose.when: insert into board values(null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, (select ifnull(max( g_no ), 0 ) + 1 from board a), 1, 0, now(), #{userNo})

select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{(page-1)*size }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{(page-1)*size }, #{size }
